summary: This document consists of official inmate count slips and rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 7-8, 2019. It includes unit-by-unit inmate counts and specific inmate rosters, one of which lists an inmate with a 'SUICIDE OR' assignment code. The documents are routine prison administrative records from the time of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration.

persons.name: Torres
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster dated 08-07-2019 with a 'HOSP' assignment and the code 'SUICIDE OR'.

persons.name: Gama-Pineda
persons.context: Listed on inmate rosters dated 08-08-2019 with a 'HOSP' assignment and the code 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.

persons.name: Harrison
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster dated 08-08-2019 with a 'TNWDVR' (Town Driver) assignment.

events.title: MCC Inmate Count and Roster
events.description: Routine inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York. An inmate roster lists 'Torres' with a 'HOSP' assignment and the code 'SUICIDE OR'.

events.title: MCC Inmate Count and Rosters
events.description: Multiple routine inmate counts conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York. Inmate rosters list 'Gama-Pineda' with a 'HOSP' assignment and 'SUICIDE OR' code, and 'Harrison' with a 'TNWDVR' (Town Driver) assignment.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: These are official Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 7-8, 2019.
An inmate roster from August 7, 2019, lists an inmate named 'Torres' (Reg #85621-054) with an assignment of 'HOSP' and the code 'SUICIDE OR'.
Inmate rosters from August 8, 2019, list an inmate named 'Gama-Pineda' (Reg #85918-054) with an assignment of 'HOSP' and the code 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.
Another inmate roster from August 8, 2019, lists an inmate named 'Harrison' (Reg #57084-056) with an assignment of 'TNWDVR' (Town Driver).
The documents show standard prison administrative procedures for tracking inmate location and status through unit-based counts and specific assignments.
